alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 6:28AM CDT until April 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca affecting Cottonwood and Murray Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa...Minnesota... James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. Big Sioux River near Richland affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Lyon, Lincoln and Minnehaha Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River near Canton affecting Lyon, Lincoln and Sioux Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Union and Plymouth Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Union, Lincoln and Sioux Counties. Rock River near Hardwick affecting Rock County. Redwood River at Russell affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Des Moines River near Avoca. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 1426.0 feet, significant amounts of crop and pasture land are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 1425.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 AM CDT Thursday was 1425.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 1425.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 1425.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun West Fork Des Moines River Avoca 1425.0 1425.3 Thu 5 am 1425. 1425. 1425. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Thursday afternoon.
